thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: NGL Energy Partners LP And Magnum Liquids, LLC Announce Signing Joint Venture Agreements

author: Reuters Editorial
title: NGL Energy Partners LP And Magnum Liquids, LLC Announce Signing Joint Venture Agreements
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Ngl Energy Partners Lp:
* NGL ENERGY PARTNERS LP AND MAGNUM LIQUIDS, LLC ANNOUNCE SIGNING JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENTS FOR SAWTOOTH NATURAL GAS LIQUIDS AND REFINED PRODUCTS STORAGE ASSETS
* NGL ENERGY PARTNERS LP SAYS WILL OWN ABOUT 67.6% OF JV AND MAGNUM WILL OWN REMAINING 32.4% AT CLOSING
* NGL ENERGY PARTNERS - NGL WILL SELL INTEREST IN SAWTOOTH TO MAGNUM FOR $45 MILLION IN CASH DUE AT CLOSINGâ€‹
* NGL ENERGY PARTNERS LP - MAGNUM WILL HAVE OPTION TO ACQUIRE ADDITIONAL 21.6% INTEREST FROM CO IN JV Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
